Found a solution for logo crash/black screen problem. Goto Nvidia control panel. Click manage 3D settings. And select high performance Nvidia processor. Play the game

Found a solution for logo crash/black screen problem. Goto Nvidia control panel. Click manage 3D settings. And select high performance Nvidia processor under preferred graphics processor. 

Now you can play. 100% tested working!!!
